name: The Tower (itch) (fullmetalashley)
description:
"The Tower" is a horror point & click title that's in an early stage of development. This current build is more like a demo, with newer rooms, puzzles, and story coming at a later date.

The game is a husband and wife project. Ashley was responsible for the art, design, and coding/programing. Daniel was responsible for dialogue, narrative design, and puzzle design.

The Tower was made for the PaleMoonGames jam in February 2020!  We wanted to do a horror game with a point and click style since it's one we'd never done before.  Unfortunately, this was a weekend where family emergences kept us from working at full capacity.  Because of that, functionality is limited, but you can still explore the first area and get to know Rachel.  The theme of duality is explored more in the full narrative!
